requirement_tested: A homepage displaying general office information and a welcome message
user_persona: A new patient looking to learn about the clinic before scheduling an appointment.
user_goal: To view the clinic's welcome message and contact details on the homepage.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting the Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens her browser and navigates to the clinic's website. She expects to see a welcoming introduction and basic information about the office.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page loads with a light cyan background, showing the clinic’s name in a centered header and a welcome message fetched from the database below it.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Office Details
narrative_steps.description: Sarah scrolls down to look for the clinic's address, phone number, and email displayed clearly on the page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Office details including address, phone, and email are visible within cadet blue UI components below the welcome section.

requirement_tested: An 'About Us' page providing details about the clinical office and its mission
user_persona: A prospective patient interested in understanding the clinic's values and history.
user_goal: To read detailed information about the clinic’s mission and background.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing the About Us Page
narrative_steps.description: Curious about the clinic’s background, Sarah clicks on the 'About Us' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'About Us' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The About Us page loads with a light cyan background and cadet blue text presenting the clinic’s story and mission retrieved from the database.

requirement_tested: A 'Services' page listing all medical services offered by the office
user_persona: A returning patient wanting to explore additional services offered by the clinic.
user_goal: To review the list of services provided along with their descriptions and durations.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Services
narrative_steps.description: Sarah selects the 'Services' option from the top navigation menu to see what treatments are available.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Services' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The Services page displays a responsive grid of cards with each service's name, description, and duration, styled with cadet blue on a light cyan background.

requirement_tested: A 'Contact Us' page with a form allowing users to send messages to the office
user_persona: A visitor who has questions about insurance coverage and wants to reach out directly.
user_goal: To submit a question through the contact form on the website.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Contact Page
narrative_steps.description: Having specific questions, Sarah clicks the 'Contact Us' link to get in touch with the office.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Contact Us' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The Contact Us page loads with a centered form featuring fields for name, email, subject, and message, styled appropriately.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting the Form
narrative_steps.description: Sarah fills out the form carefully and submits it, hoping for a prompt reply.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in the required fields and click the 'Submit' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: If all fields are valid, the form submits successfully and displays a confirmation message indicating the inquiry was sent.

requirement_tested: A navigation menu enabling quick access to all main pages
user_persona: A frequent visitor navigating between different sections of the site.
user_goal: To easily move between the homepage, About Us, Services, and Contact pages using the navigation menu.

narrative_steps.title: Using Navigation Menu
narrative_steps.description: While browsing, Sarah uses the fixed top navigation menu to jump to other sections of the website.
narrative_steps.action: Click on various links in the navigation menu (e.g., Home, About Us, Services).
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each click smoothly transitions to the selected page without requiring a full reload, maintaining consistent styling throughout.

requirement_tested: Frontend styled with a light cyan background and cadet blue UI components
user_persona: A visually-oriented user paying attention to design consistency.
user_goal: To experience a cohesive visual theme across all pages of the website.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Site Styling
narrative_steps.description: As Sarah browses multiple pages, she notices how consistently the site maintains its color scheme.
narrative_steps.action: Visit several pages including Home, About, Services, and Contact.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Every page displays a light cyan background with cadet blue headings, buttons, and structural elements, ensuring visual harmony.

requirement_tested: Responsive design ensuring usability across desktop and mobile devices
user_persona: A mobile user accessing the website on their smartphone.
user_goal: To navigate and use the website effectively on a smaller screen.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Website on Mobile
narrative_steps.description: On her phone, Sarah visits the clinic’s website and checks whether it adapts well to her device.
narrative_steps.action: Open the website on a mobile device or resize browser window to simulate mobile view.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The layout adjusts responsively—navigation collapses into a hamburger menu, fonts resize, and content stacks vertically for optimal readability.

requirement_tested: Backend API support for handling contact form submissions
user_persona: A user submitting feedback via the contact form.
user_goal: To have the submitted contact form data processed and stored securely by the backend.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Valid Contact Form
narrative_steps.description: After filling out the contact form completely and accurately, Sarah hits the submit button.
narrative_steps.action: Complete and submit the contact form with valid data.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The frontend sends a POST request to '/api/contact/submit', which processes and stores the data in the PostgreSQL database, returning a success response.

requirement_tested: Database integration using PostgreSQL with specified environment variables
user_goal: To confirm that the backend successfully connects to the PostgreSQL database using provided credentials.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Database Connection
narrative_steps.description: During setup, the developer ensures that the backend properly initializes the database connection.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend server and check initialization logs.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The backend connects to PostgreSQL at localhost:5432 using the username 'myappuser' and database 'myapp', logging successful connection status.

requirement_tested: Frontend fetches dynamic data from backend APIs where applicable
user_persona: An end-user viewing up-to-date office information.
user_goal: To see real-time data pulled from the backend instead of static placeholders.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Dynamic Data
narrative_steps.description: When visiting the homepage, Sarah sees fresh content pulled live from the backend rather than hardcoded text.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The frontend makes an API call to '/api/office-info/homepage' and renders the dynamic welcome message and office details received from the backend.

requirement_tested: Package.json configured with `install:all` script to install frontend and backend dependencies
user_persona: A new team member setting up the project locally.
user_goal: To easily install all necessary dependencies for both frontend and backend with one command.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Cloning the repo for the first time, the developer runs the setup command to prepare the working environment.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run install:all` from the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend dependencies are installed successfully in their respective directories.

requirement_tested: Package.json configured with `dev` script to start frontend and backend concurrently
user_persona: A developer beginning daily work on the project.
user_goal: To launch both frontend and backend servers simultaneously for efficient development.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Ready to begin coding, the developer starts both servers with a single command.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` from the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Concurrently launches the React development server and Node.js backend, making both accessible for testing and debugging.

requirement_tested: Static page rendering for informational content
user_persona: A user reading the clinic's mission statement.
user_goal: To access fast-loading, readable content without unnecessary interactivity.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Static Content
narrative_steps.description: While exploring the About Us page, Sarah reads through the clinic’s core values presented as plain text.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the About Us page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page renders quickly with static HTML content fetched from the backend, providing a clean and distraction-free reading experience.

requirement_tested: Form validation on the contact page to ensure proper user input
user_persona: A hurried user accidentally leaving required fields blank.
user_goal: To be guided to correct mistakes before submitting the contact form.

narrative_steps.title: Leaving Required Fields Blank
narrative_steps.description: In a rush, Sarah tries to submit the contact form but forgets to fill some fields.
narrative_steps.action: Attempt to submit the form with empty name and email fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Inline validation messages immediately appear next to the empty fields, prompting Sarah to provide the missing information.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Invalid Email Format
narrative_steps.description: Trying again, Sarah enters an incorrectly formatted email address.
narrative_steps.action: Type an invalid email and attempt to submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An error message shows beneath the email field indicating that a valid email format is required.

requirement_tested: SEO-friendly page titles and meta descriptions for each page
user_persona: A potential patient searching online for nearby clinics.
user_goal: To find accurate and compelling search results when browsing for the clinic online.

narrative_steps.title: Searching Online
narrative_steps.description: Sarah searches for 'clinical office near me' and looks at the search engine results page.
narrative_steps.action: Perform a search query simulating organic traffic.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each indexed page displays a unique, descriptive title and meta description matching the content, improving click-through rates from search engines.
